about.title: about
description: I'm a Masters 1 Computer Science student specialized in Cyber Security at the Higher School of Computer Science and Technology (ESTIN) in Bejaia, Algeria.
I've completed internships at Sonatrach, Enafor DZ, Algérie Télécom and SETRAM, building a strong professional background. Skilled in backend development with FastAPI and Django.

contacts.title: contacts
contacts.text: I'm interested in internship and job opportunities in Cyber Security and Backend Development. Don't hesitate to contact me

list.description: Algerian National Drilling Enterprise - IT Department

list.institution: ESTIN - Higher School of Computer Science and Technology
list.degree: Computer Science Engineering in Cyber Security

description: I'm a Masters 1 Computer Science student specialized in Cyber Security at the Higher School of Computer Science and Technology (ESTIN) in Bejaia, with prior studies at the University Kasdi Merbah of Ouargla.
I've completed internships at Sonatrach, Enafor DZ, Algérie Télécom and SETRAM, building a strong professional background.
Certified in SQL (DataCamp), FastAPI (CodeSignal), 21st Century Skills (World Learning & HSBC) and Basics of E-Services (Albalasmeh Business Company).
Skilled in backend development with FastAPI and Django. I've developed and contributed to several projects including a PyQt5 desktop app, the DZ-Tabib web platform, and the Showcase Station system.

facts.title: personal-info
list: Passionate about Cyber Security and Backend Development
